    • Method Detail

      • getParents

        public static ubic.erminej.data.GeneSetTerms getParents(java.lang.String species,
                                        java.io.File geneAssocFile,
                                        java.lang.String isOldEdition,
                                        java.util.logging.Logger logger,
                                        int editionNumber)
        This function will get all parents for each go term in gene association file Given an gene association file we will get its parents by using matchingDatesfile to associate date to edition number
        Parameters:
        dir - : Where gene association files are found
        termdbdir - : Where termdb file are found
        geneAssocFile - : The file we are going to operate with
        isOldEdition - : Whether termdb file has to be parsed as an old edition
        matchingDatesfile - : File that matches edition with publication date
        Returns:
        File name that contains all go parents

      • getTermdbFromGeneAssoc

        public static java.lang.String getTermdbFromGeneAssoc(java.lang.String species,
                                      java.lang.String geneAssoc,
                                      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Calendar> matchdates2edition,
                                      java.util.logging.Logger logger)
        This function calculates the name of the termdb file associated with a gene association file using matchEditionDateFile
        Parameters:
        termdbdir - Where termdb files are found
        dir - Where result will be saved
        geneAssoc - gene association file
        matchEditionDateFile - File that matches an edition to its date

      • getParentFileAdjust

        public static java.lang.String getParentFileAdjust(java.util.Calendar date,
                                   java.lang.String species)
        Given a particular date, this function will calculate the parent's file name
        Parameters:
        date -
        Returns:
        files like parents/go.parents."+year+"-"+month+".txt

        Returns:

      • getSimpleParents

        public static java.lang.String getSimpleParents(java.lang.String species,
                                java.lang.String parentFile,
                                java.lang.String edition,
                                java.util.logging.Logger logger)
        We generate a new simplified file out of the previous parent file. Simplified file will only have two columns
        Parameters:
        dir - Where previous file can be found
        parentFile - Previous parent file
        edition - Edition number
        Returns:
        New parent file name

      • getParentsFromXML

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String>> getParentsFromXML(java.lang.String termdbFile)
        Gets parents reading the xml directly This function is not used in gotrack but it was written for exploratory analysis
        Parameters:
        termdbFile -
        Returns:
        Map of a go term and its parents using directly the termdb
